project_descr: This project is to support United Nations Resident Coordinator work in Syria - UNRCO

outputs.output_descr:
The main purpose is to support the development of the UN Strategic Framework (UNSF) and other strategic documents as so requested, as well as follow up implementation of the Syrian Humanitarian Response Plan (HRP).
The RCO in Syria plays a critical advisory role to the UN Country Team (UNCT) while interfacing with the Government of Syria and NGOs. It contributes to UNCT policy and strategy development processes, and facilitates operational coordination and UN agency presence at UN hubs. 
The RCO assists the RC/HC to retain overall leadership in the delivery of programmes so that the UN system
